title: ATLAS - QSAM FILES TREATMENT FOR FIRE REPORTING
time_sequence: GR - ATLAS PHASE 6.3 - PROCESSING AFTER STAR 2

task_list.instruction_title:
_For each saved after Star2 in IP Task [TRT-6254](TRT-6254_116109542.html), please do the Following Actions_

_- Adapt the Tag of the backup to reflect Cutover date _

_- Backup of the monthly file_
_- Replacement of the monthly file by the EOD*2 file._

**STEP 1: QSAM SECURITY FILE**

Monthly file        : /files/data/PCR/ FCRK1/MENS.QSAM

Daily file               : /files/data/PCR/FCRK1.QSAM




Cp /files/data/PCR/FCRK1/MENS.QSAM                   /files/data/PCR/FCRK1/MENS**_20250822**.QSAM

Cp /files/data/PCR/FCRK1.QSAM                              /files/data/PCR/FCRK1/FCRK1**FUSIONSTAR2**.QSAM       

Cp /files/data/PCR/FCRK1.QSAM                              /files/data/PCR/FCRK1/MENS.QSAM

Monthly file        : /files/data/P04/F04CMEN.QSAM

Cp /files/data/P04/F04C.QSAM                 /files/data/P04/F04C**FUSIONSTAR2**.QSAM
